ratings.comment: I had him as a tutor and he has been extremely helpful. After a week or two, you can fully understand his accent and he cares about how you are doing as long as you put in the effort.

He doesn't give very clear explanations, and if you ask him to clarify he will get aggressive and confrontational. His class is extremely test heavy and combine that with the fact he is barely competent at teaching makes the class unnecessarily difficult.
I had him for WiscAMP program, he taught us Calc 3 in like 6 weeks and I pretty much learned it. 10/10 would recommend

Professor Kaba is a great professor. At first he seemed intimidating, but he's one of the best math teachers I have had. He likes getting to know students by name, and he pretty much tells you the exact problems you'll see on exams. There is online homework but it's not too bad, and if you go in to office hours he very much willing to help you.

Professor Kaba is a wonderful instructor and a hilarious person. When he would say "this problem will be on the exam," he wouldn't mean a similar problem, he literally meant that problem, same numbers and everything. Excellent teacher, definitely recommend.

Professor Kaba is the best math teach I have ever had. If you attend lecture, he presents concepts and gives multiple examples for each. He knew most people's names in our lecture of around 70 people. Very funny guy, and truly cares about the well being of students. I wish I could take another class with him! Definitely recommend.

Not only is Professor Kaba really fun, but he is an amazing teacher. English isn't his first language, so you know he's not just throwing words around for the hell of it. If you go to class, take notes, and take practice tests - you will do well in this class. He is also available for office hours and will respect you for taking the time to meet.

He was basically like a second professor for another discussion session under the Tutorial Program. He was very helpful, would answer any questions and ask you questions to make sure you understand. Very nice and extremely smart guy. Recommend the tutorial program even if you aren't struggling bad.

Oumar has tutored me in math since algebra through math 320. He teaches everything from trig to differential equations. He knows how to engage students and present the material in an exciting, simplified, straightforward manner. I would definitely recommend him. He's the best math instructor (tutor) I have ever had!
